vsParam:
No! It's not like that! No one holds a sword like this.
How could you exert your strength!

Look, don't think you are just holding the sword with your
hand. Consider your weapon as an extension of your body.

Everyone, pick up your weapons.
Let me see how you hold them.

This is so rare.
Tandrion is earnestly instructing the guards.

Indeed. He usually just arranges
some unintelligible training.
So that's what he looks like when instructing properly...
It's not an omen of something bad, is it...
Why is he so casual at usual times?

That's possible. I'm getting worried...
[px], stop saying ominous things like that!

It feels strange when he's less casual.
What on earth is going on...
Hey, you guys! I heard that!

Wow!?
B-but, we are just telling the truth!

I have a less-casual mode as well.
I happen to be on that mode today...

So, I may also train my dear disciple's friends. Fitness training
can help with your professional assignments, right?
Boohoo, Captain just called me his dear disciple!

Cresson, you too.
Don't worry. I'll help if you can't finish it.
W-wait, what have you planned for us!?
Uh? I want you to anyhow wipe out the monsters near here.

Hmm, that sentence doesn't make any sense, anyhow wipe out!?
Hey! Are you even listening to me!?

I didn't realize that you guys are so good.
I'm happy to see that.

Phew, phew... I am dying!
You're to blame if I gain muscle any out of this, huh!?

I think a muscular Sorel
must be... beautiful too, huh? Ha-ha-ha...

A-are you... kidding me! A-Anise!?
Are you suffering brain damage from the training!?

Boo-hoo, I am so tired...
But the purpose of the training has been accomplished...

I enjoyed this training for it's different from our normal ones.
If you need more such training, you can come to me at any time.

Er. Come find me whenever you are ready! You can experience
the training programs I specially design for you!

You are welcome. You want to get stronger, right?
I have plenty of training programs for you to choose from!

Aren't Tandrion's training programs... always things like bunny hops
in place or waterfall practice in the Academy fountain?

Yes, those are the best ones Captain came up with!
What do you think? Let's work together to get stronger!
Hahaha, sorry. But I don't think so...
